Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Remover \Re*mov"er\ (-?r), n. One who removes; as, a remover of landmarks. --Bacon. [1913 Webster]
remover n 1: a solvent that removes a substance (usually from a surface); "paint remover"; "rust remover"; "hair remover" 2: someone who works for a moving company
